Project.name: Login Demo for C#
Project.Description: This Silverlight demo illustrates the use of PureMVC communicating with a generic .NET WebService to perform a simple login operation.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Features in Version 1.0
  • Communicates with a remote .NET WebService from Silverlight
  • This demo was ported from the original PureMVC AS3 Flex/WebOrb Login Demo
  • To login, use Username: admin / Password: admin.
Project.Installation:
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a Login_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\Login_X_Y
